publicationStmt.authority: Casting Digital Nets: Fishery Modeling, Native Dispossession, and Dynamic History on the Great Plains

address.addrLine: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

div1.p: There is considerable worry among the nimrods as to the lake being so low that it will freeze to the bottom in large portions of it and destroy the bass that are now so prolific. It is believed by many that a subscription could be secured from surrounding towns who enjoy the sport each year to pay for sinking another artesian well.
